_source.text: 11/22/03 I began taking the prescription drug Calcitriol (one 0.5 mcg capsule daily), a form of Vitamin D which is better assimilated than over-the-counter Vitamin D. Another advantage of Calcitriol is that it slows the growth of prostate cancer.

text: 11/22/03 I began taking the **prescription** **drug** **Calcitriol** (one 0.5 mcg capsule daily), a form of
Vitamin D which **is** **better** assimilated than over-the-counter Vitamin D. Another advantage of **Calcitriol** is that it slows the growth of prostate cancer.
